{"id":534673007,"lang":"cpp","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1628339943,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/534673007/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"16.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        stack<int> s;\n        int n = height.size();\n        int res = 0;\n        int i = 0;\n        while(i < n)\n        {\n            if(s.empty() || (height[i] < height[s.top()]))\n            {\n                s.push(i);\n                i++;\n            }\n            else\n            {\n                int t = s.top();\n                s.pop();                \n                \n                if(s.empty())\n                    continue;\n                \n                res += (min(height[s.top()], height[i]) - height[t]) * (i - s.top() - 1);\n            }\n        }\n        \n//         while(!s.empty())\n//         {\n//             int t = s.top();\n//             s.pop();\n\n//             if(s.empty())\n//                 break;\n\n//             res += (min(height[s.top()], height[i]) - height[t]) * (i - s.top() - 1);\n//         }\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
